div.h3: 阅读文章，选择最佳答案
div.p: Amy lives in America. Amy is very happy because she lives in a very good place. Across from her apartment, there’s a bank, a post office, and a restaurant. Next to the apartment, there’s a drug store. Behind the apartment, there is a supermarket.There’s a lot of noise near Amy’s apartment, because there are a lot of cars and there are a lot of people on the street all day and all night. However, Amy isn’t very upset about the noise. Her apartment is in the center of the city. It’s a very busy place, but it’s still a convenient place to live in.
